game.name: psy-relic
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 심령 현상에 의해 이상을 지닌 '심령 유물'을 수집하는 협동 호러 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cooperative horror game in which you collect "psy-relics" that have abnormalities caused by psychic phenomena.
